p: The title compound was obtained in 36% yield from compound 33 following the general procedure for Suzuki arylation: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 3.91 (s, 3H), 4.63 (s, 2H), 6.54 (d, J = 7.5 Hz, 1H), 6.72 (s, 1H), 7.10 (d, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 7.32 (t, J = 7.8 Hz, 1H), 7.46–7.51 (m, 4H), 7.62 (s, 1H), 8.02 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 2H), 8.20 (d, J = 1.8 Hz, 1H), 9.01 (d, J = 2.1 Hz, 1H).
